issue.title: [C++] Add fnmatch compatible globbing function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6257](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6257). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will be useful for the filesystems module and in datasource discovery, which uses it.

Behavior should be compatible with http://pubs.opengroup.org/onlinepubs/000095399/functions/fnmatch.html

comments.body:
